xcodeConfiguration.description: (iOS) Xcode configuration to use. Debug or Release

scheme.description: (iOS) Explicitly set the Xcode scheme to use

variant.description: (Android) Specify your app's build variant (e.g. debug, release).

device.description: Device name or UDID to build the app on. The value is not required if you have a single device connected.

port.description: Port to start the Metro bundler on

bundler.description: Whether to skip starting the Metro bundler. True to start it, false to skip it.

install.description: Installing npm packages and CocoaPods before building.

buildCache.description: Should use derived data for builds.

clean.description: Delete the native folders and regenerate them before applying changes
